description:
Seizures are not a good thing. This anti-seize compound reduces friction and prevents corrosion and rust any time, any season.

  • For use with steel, aluminum and titanium
  • Smooths assembly and disassembly of bottom brackets, pedals, pressend headset cups, seat posts and quill stems
name: Park Tool ASC-1 Anti-Seize Compound - 4oz/113g
